mapper.select: SELECT q_code, q_id, q_title, q_contents, q_date, LEFT(q_time,5) as q_time, q_check, q_writer FROM qna_board ORDER BY q_code DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startPage}
SELECT q_code,q_id,q_title,q_contents,q_date,LEFT(q_time,5) as q_time,q_check,q_writer FROM qna_board WHERE q_code = #{q_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board (q_id, q_title, q_contents, q_date, q_time, q_check, q_writer) VALUES ( #{q_id}, #{q_title}, #{q_contents}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s'), #{q_check}, #{q_writer} )
INSERT INTO qna_comment (q_code,q_id,q_comment,q_date,q_time,q_writer) VALUES( #{q_code}, #{q_id}, #{q_comment}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s'), #{q_writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT q_code_co,q_code, q_id, q_comment, q_date, LEFT(q_time,5) as q_time ,q_writer FROM qna_comment WHERE q_code = #{q_code} ORDER BY q_code_co
SELECT q_code_co,q_date,LEFT(q_time,5) as q_time FROM qna_comment WHERE q_code = #{q_code} ORDER BY q_code_co DESC LIMIT 1
